price: O my people, I fear for you the Day of crying out to one another[8],
arabic: وَيَٰقَوۡمِ إِنِّيٓ أَخَافُ عَلَيۡكُمۡ يَوۡمَ ٱلتَّنَادِ
footnotes: [8] i.e., on the Day of Judgment; the wicked will cry out in terror, and the angels will call out the results of each person's judgment.

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
